verses.text_uthmani: حمٓ

translations.text: Ḥâ-Mĩm.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ha-meem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلْكِتَـٰبِ ٱلْمُبِينِ

translations.text: By the clear Book!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walkitabi almubeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّا جَعَلْنَـٰهُ قُرْءَٰنًا عَرَبِيًّا لَّعَلَّكُمْ تَعْقِلُونَ

translations.text: Certainly, We have made it a Quran in Arabic so perhaps you will understand.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna jaAAalnahu qur-ananAAarabiyyan laAAallakum taAAqiloona
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِنَّهُۥ فِىٓ أُمِّ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ لَدَيْنَا لَعَلِىٌّ حَكِيمٌ

translations.text: And indeed, it is—in the Master Record<sup foot_note=77328>1</sup> with Us—highly esteemed, rich in wisdom.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-innahu fee ommi alkitabi ladaynalaAAaliyyun hakeem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَفَنَضْرِبُ عَنكُمُ ٱلذِّكْرَ صَفْحًا أَن كُنتُمْ قَوْمًا مُّسْرِفِينَ

translations.text: Should We then turn the ˹Quranic˺ Reminder away from you ˹simply˺ because you have been a transgressing people?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Afanadribu AAankumu aththikrasafhan an kuntum qawman musrifeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَكَمْ أَرْسَلْنَا مِن نَّبِىٍّ فِى ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ

translations.text: ˹Imagine˺ how many prophets We sent to those ˹destroyed˺ before!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wakam arsalna min nabiyyin feeal-awwaleen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَا يَأْتِيهِم مِّن نَّبِىٍّ إِلَّا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ

translations.text: But no prophet ever came to them without being mocked.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama ya/teehim min nabiyyin illakanoo bihi yastahzi-oon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَأَهْلَكْنَآ أَشَدَّ مِنْهُم بَطْشًا وَمَضَىٰ مَثَلُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ

translations.text: So We destroyed those who were far mightier than these ˹Meccans˺. The examples of ˹their˺ predecessors have ˹already˺ been related.<sup foot_note=77329>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faahlakna ashadda minhum batshanwamada mathalu al-awwaleen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَئِن سَأَلْتَهُم مَّنْ خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ لَيَقُولُنَّ خَلَقَهُنَّ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ

translations.text: If you ask them ˹O Prophet˺ who created the heavens and the earth, they will certainly say, “The Almighty, All-Knowing did.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wala-in saaltahum man khalaqa assamawatiwal-arda layaqoolunna khalaqahunna alAAazeezualAAaleem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ مَهْدًا وَجَعَلَ لَكُمْ فِيهَا سُبُلًا لَّعَلَّكُمْ تَهْتَدُونَ

translations.text: ˹He is the One˺ Who has laid out the earth for you, and set in it pathways for you so that you may find your way.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Allathee jaAAala lakumu al-ardamahdan wajaAAala lakum feeha subulan laAAallakum tahtadoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلَّذِى نَزَّلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءًۢ بِقَدَرٍ فَأَنشَرْنَا بِهِۦ بَلْدَةً مَّيْتًا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ تُخْرَجُونَ

translations.text: And ˹He is the One˺ Who sends down rain from the sky in perfect measure, with which We give life to a lifeless land. And so will you be brought forth ˹from the grave˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wallathee nazzala mina assama-imaan biqadarin faansharna bihi baldatan maytan kathalikatukhrajoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلْأَزْوَٰجَ كُلَّهَا وَجَعَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْفُلْكِ وَٱلْأَنْعَـٰمِ مَا تَرْكَبُونَ

translations.text: And ˹He is the One˺ Who created all ˹things in˺ pairs,<sup foot_note=77330>1</sup> and made for you ships and animals to ride
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wallathee khalaqa al-azwajakullaha wajaAAala lakum mina alfulki wal-anAAamima tarkaboon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لِتَسْتَوُۥا۟ عَلَىٰ ظُهُورِهِۦ ثُمَّ تَذْكُرُوا۟ نِعْمَةَ رَبِّكُمْ إِذَا ٱسْتَوَيْتُمْ عَلَيْهِ وَتَقُولُوا۟ سُبْحَـٰنَ ٱلَّذِى سَخَّرَ لَنَا هَـٰذَا وَمَا كُنَّا لَهُۥ مُقْرِنِينَ

translations.text: so that you may sit firmly on their backs, and remember your Lord’s blessings once you are settled on them, saying, “Glory be to the One Who has subjected these for us, for we could have never done so ˹on our own˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Litastawoo AAala thuhoorihithumma tathkuroo niAAmata rabbikum itha istawaytumAAalayhi wataqooloo subhana allathee sakhkhara lanahatha wama kunna lahu muqrineen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِنَّآ إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا لَمُنقَلِبُونَ

translations.text: And surely to our Lord we will ˹all˺ return.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-inna ila rabbinalamunqaliboon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَجَعَلُوا۟ لَهُۥ مِنْ عِبَادِهِۦ جُزْءًا ۚ إِنَّ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ لَكَفُورٌ مُّبِينٌ

translations.text: Still the pagans have made some of His creation out to be a part of Him.<sup foot_note=77331>1</sup> Indeed, humankind is clearly ungrateful.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: WajaAAaloo lahu min AAibadihi juz-aninna al-insana lakafoorun mubeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذَ مِمَّا يَخْلُقُ بَنَاتٍ وَأَصْفَىٰكُم بِٱلْبَنِينَ

translations.text: Has He taken ˹angels as His˺ daughters from what He created, and favoured you ˹O pagans˺ with sons?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ami ittakhatha mimma yakhluqubanatin waasfakum bilbaneen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِذَا بُشِّرَ أَحَدُهُم بِمَا ضَرَبَ لِلرَّحْمَـٰنِ مَثَلًا ظَلَّ وَجْهُهُۥ مُسْوَدًّا وَهُوَ كَظِيمٌ

translations.text: Whenever one of them is given the good news of what they attribute to the Most Compassionate,<sup foot_note=77332>1</sup> his face grows gloomy, as he suppresses his rage.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-itha bushshira ahaduhum bimadaraba lirrahmani mathalan thallawajhuhu muswaddan wahuwa katheem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَوَمَن يُنَشَّؤُا۟ فِى ٱلْحِلْيَةِ وَهُوَ فِى ٱلْخِصَامِ غَيْرُ مُبِينٍ

translations.text: ˹Do they attribute to Him˺ those who are brought up in fineries and are not commanding in disputes?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Awaman yunashshao fee alhilyatiwahuwa fee alkhisami ghayru mubeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَجَعَلُوا۟ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةَ ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ عِبَـٰدُ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ إِنَـٰثًا ۚ أَشَهِدُوا۟ خَلْقَهُمْ ۚ سَتُكْتَبُ شَهَـٰدَتُهُمْ وَيُسْـَٔلُونَ

translations.text: Still they have labelled the angels, who are servants of the Most Compassionate, as female. Did they witness their creation? Their statement will be recorded, and they will be questioned!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: WajaAAaloo almala-ikata allatheenahum AAibadu arrahmani inathanashahidoo khalqahum satuktabu shahadatuhum wayus-aloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَقَالُوا۟ لَوْ شَآءَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ مَا عَبَدْنَـٰهُم ۗ مَّا لَهُم بِذَٰلِكَ مِنْ عِلْمٍ ۖ إِنْ هُمْ إِلَّا يَخْرُصُونَ

translation.text: we would not have worshipped them
we would not have worshipped them

translations.text: And they argue, “Had the Most Compassionate willed, we would have never worshipped them.” They have no knowledge ˹in support˺ of this ˹claim˺. They do nothing but lie.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waqaloo law shaa arrahmanuma AAabadnahum ma lahum bithalika minAAilmin in hum illa yakhrusoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَمْ ءَاتَيْنَـٰهُمْ كِتَـٰبًا مِّن قَبْلِهِۦ فَهُم بِهِۦ مُسْتَمْسِكُونَ

translations.text: Or have We given them a Book ˹for proof˺, before this ˹Quran˺, to which they are holding firm?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Am ataynahum kitabanmin qablihi fahum bihi mustamsikoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: بَلْ قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا وَجَدْنَآ ءَابَآءَنَا عَلَىٰٓ أُمَّةٍ وَإِنَّا عَلَىٰٓ ءَاثَـٰرِهِم مُّهْتَدُونَ

translations.text: In fact, they say, “We found our forefathers following a ˹particular˺ way, and we are following in their footsteps.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Bal qaloo inna wajadna abaanaAAala ommatin wa-inna AAala atharihimmuhtadoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَكَذَٰلِكَ مَآ أَرْسَلْنَا مِن قَبْلِكَ فِى قَرْيَةٍ مِّن نَّذِيرٍ إِلَّا قَالَ مُتْرَفُوهَآ إِنَّا وَجَدْنَآ ءَابَآءَنَا عَلَىٰٓ أُمَّةٍ وَإِنَّا عَلَىٰٓ ءَاثَـٰرِهِم مُّقْتَدُونَ

translations.text: Similarly, whenever We sent a warner to a society before you ˹O Prophet˺, its ˹spoiled˺ elite would say, “We found our forefathers following a ˹particular˺ way, and we are walking in their footsteps.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wakathalika ma arsalnamin qablika fee qaryatin min natheerin illa qalamutrafooha inna wajadna abaanaAAala ommatin wa-inna AAala atharihimmuqtadoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ۞ قَـٰلَ أَوَلَوْ جِئْتُكُم بِأَهْدَىٰ مِمَّا وَجَدتُّمْ عَلَيْهِ ءَابَآءَكُمْ ۖ قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا بِمَآ أُرْسِلْتُم بِهِۦ كَـٰفِرُونَ

translations.text: Each ˹warner˺ asked, “Even if what I brought you is better guidance than what you found your forefathers practicing?” They replied, “We totally reject whatever you have been sent with.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala awa law ji/tukum bi-ahdamimma wajadtum AAalayhi abaakum qalooinna bima orsiltum bihi kafiroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَٱنتَقَمْنَا مِنْهُمْ ۖ فَٱنظُرْ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَـٰقِبَةُ ٱلْمُكَذِّبِينَ

translations.text: So We inflicted punishment upon them. See then what was the fate of the deniers!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fantaqamna minhum fanthurkayfa kana AAaqibatu almukaththibeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِذْ قَالَ إِبْرَٰهِيمُ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوْمِهِۦٓ إِنَّنِى بَرَآءٌ مِّمَّا تَعْبُدُونَ

translations.text: ˹Remember, O  Prophet˺ when Abraham declared to his father and his people, “I am totally free of whatever ˹gods˺ you worship,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-ith qala ibraheemuli-abeehi waqawmihi innanee baraon mimma taAAbudoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِى فَطَرَنِى فَإِنَّهُۥ سَيَهْدِينِ

translations.text: except the One Who originated me, and He will surely guide me.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Illa allathee fataraneefa-innahu sayahdeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَجَعَلَهَا كَلِمَةًۢ بَاقِيَةً فِى عَقِبِهِۦ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَرْجِعُونَ

translations.text: And he left this enduring declaration among his descendants, so they may ˹always˺ turn back ˹to Allah˺.<sup foot_note=77333>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: WajaAAalaha kalimatan baqiyatanfee AAaqibihi laAAallahum yarjiAAoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: بَلْ مَتَّعْتُ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ وَءَابَآءَهُمْ حَتَّىٰ جَآءَهُمُ ٱلْحَقُّ وَرَسُولٌ مُّبِينٌ

translations.text: In fact, I had allowed enjoyment for these ˹Meccans˺ and their forefathers, until the truth came to them along with a messenger making things clear.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Bal mattaAAtu haola-i waabaahumhatta jaahumu alhaqqu warasoolunmubeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَمَّا جَآءَهُمُ ٱلْحَقُّ قَالُوا۟ هَـٰذَا سِحْرٌ وَإِنَّا بِهِۦ كَـٰفِرُونَ

translations.text: ˹But˺ when the truth came to them, they said, “This is magic, and we totally reject it.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walamma jaahumu alhaqquqaloo hatha sihrun wa-inna bihi kafiroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَقَالُوا۟ لَوْلَا نُزِّلَ هَـٰذَا ٱلْقُرْءَانُ عَلَىٰ رَجُلٍ مِّنَ ٱلْقَرْيَتَيْنِ عَظِيمٍ

translations.text: And they exclaimed, “If only this Quran was revealed to a great man from ˹one of˺ the two cities!”<sup foot_note=77334>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waqaloo lawla nuzzila hathaalqur-anu AAala rajulin mina alqaryatayni AAatheem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَهُمْ يَقْسِمُونَ رَحْمَتَ رَبِّكَ ۚ نَحْنُ قَسَمْنَا بَيْنَهُم مَّعِيشَتَهُمْ فِى ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا ۚ وَرَفَعْنَا بَعْضَهُمْ فَوْقَ بَعْضٍ دَرَجَـٰتٍ لِّيَتَّخِذَ بَعْضُهُم بَعْضًا سُخْرِيًّا ۗ وَرَحْمَتُ رَبِّكَ خَيْرٌ مِّمَّا يَجْمَعُونَ

translations.text: Is it they who distribute your Lord’s mercy? We ˹alone˺ have distributed their ˹very˺ livelihood among them in this worldly life and raised some of them in rank above others so that some may employ others in service. ˹But˺ your Lord’s mercy is far better than whatever ˹wealth˺ they amass.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ahum yaqsimoona rahmata rabbika nahnuqasamna baynahum maAAeeshatahum fee alhayatiaddunya warafaAAna baAAdahum fawqabaAAdin darajatin liyattakhitha baAAduhumbaAAdan sukhriyyan warahmatu rabbika khayrun mimmayajmaAAoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَوْلَآ أَن يَكُونَ ٱلنَّاسُ أُمَّةً وَٰحِدَةً لَّجَعَلْنَا لِمَن يَكْفُرُ بِٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ لِبُيُوتِهِمْ سُقُفًا مِّن فِضَّةٍ وَمَعَارِجَ عَلَيْهَا يَظْهَرُونَ

translations.text: Were it not that people might ˹be tempted to˺ become one community ˹of disbelievers˺, We would have supplied the homes of ˹only˺ those who disbelieve in the Most Compassionate with silver roofs and ˹silver˺ stairways to ascend,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walawla an yakoona annasuommatan wahidatan lajaAAalna liman yakfuru birrahmanilibuyootihim suqufan min fiddatin wamaAAarijaAAalayha yathharoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلِبُيُوتِهِمْ أَبْوَٰبًا وَسُرُرًا عَلَيْهَا يَتَّكِـُٔونَ

translations.text: as well as ˹silver˺ gates and thrones to recline on,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walibuyootihim abwaban wasururanAAalayha yattaki-oon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَزُخْرُفًا ۚ وَإِن كُلُّ ذَٰلِكَ لَمَّا مَتَـٰعُ ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا ۚ وَٱلْـَٔاخِرَةُ عِندَ رَبِّكَ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ

translations.text: and ornaments ˹of gold˺. Yet all this is no more than a ˹fleeting˺ enjoyment in this worldly life. ˹But˺ the Hereafter with your Lord is ˹only˺ for those mindful ˹of Him˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wazukhrufan wa-in kullu thalika lammamataAAu alhayati addunya wal-akhiratuAAinda rabbika lilmuttaqeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَن يَعْشُ عَن ذِكْرِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ نُقَيِّضْ لَهُۥ شَيْطَـٰنًا فَهُوَ لَهُۥ قَرِينٌ

translations.text: And whoever turns a blind eye to the Reminder of the Most Compassionate, We place at the disposal of each a devilish one as their close associate,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waman yaAAshu AAan thikri arrahmaninuqayyid lahu shaytanan fahuwa lahu qareen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِنَّهُمْ لَيَصُدُّونَهُمْ عَنِ ٱلسَّبِيلِ وَيَحْسَبُونَ أَنَّهُم مُّهْتَدُونَ

translations.text: who will certainly hinder them from the ˹Right˺ Way while they think they are ˹rightly˺ guided.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-innahum layasuddoonahum AAani assabeeliwayahsaboona annahum muhtadoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءَنَا قَالَ يَـٰلَيْتَ بَيْنِى وَبَيْنَكَ بُعْدَ ٱلْمَشْرِقَيْنِ فَبِئْسَ ٱلْقَرِينُ

translations.text: But when such a person comes to Us, one will say ˹to their associate˺, “I wish you were as distant from me as the east is from the west! What an evil associate ˹you were˺!”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Hatta itha jaanaqala ya layta baynee wabaynaka buAAda almashriqaynifabi/sa alqareen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَن يَنفَعَكُمُ ٱلْيَوْمَ إِذ ظَّلَمْتُمْ أَنَّكُمْ فِى ٱلْعَذَابِ مُشْتَرِكُونَ

translations.text: ˹It will be said to both,˺ “Since you all did wrong, sharing in the punishment will be of no benefit to you this Day.”<sup foot_note=77335>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walan yanfaAAakumu alyawma ith thalamtumannakum fee alAAathabi mushtarikoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَفَأَنتَ تُسْمِعُ ٱلصُّمَّ أَوْ تَهْدِى ٱلْعُمْىَ وَمَن كَانَ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ

translations.text: Can you make the deaf hear, or guide the blind or those clearly astray?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Afaanta tusmiAAu assumma awtahdee alAAumya waman kana fee dalalinmubeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَإِمَّا نَذْهَبَنَّ بِكَ فَإِنَّا مِنْهُم مُّنتَقِمُونَ

translations.text: Even if We take you away ˹from this world˺, We will surely inflict punishment upon them.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fa-imma nathhabanna bikafa-inna minhum muntaqimoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَوْ نُرِيَنَّكَ ٱلَّذِى وَعَدْنَـٰهُمْ فَإِنَّا عَلَيْهِم مُّقْتَدِرُونَ

translations.text: Or if We show you what We threaten them with, We certainly have full power over them.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Aw nuriyannaka allathee waAAadnahumfa-inna AAalayhim muqtadiroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَٱسْتَمْسِكْ بِٱلَّذِىٓ أُوحِىَ إِلَيْكَ ۖ إِنَّكَ عَلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ

translations.text: So hold firmly to what has been revealed to you ˹O Prophet˺. You are truly on the Straight Path.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fastamsik billatheeoohiya ilayka innaka AAala siratinmustaqeem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَذِكْرٌ لَّكَ وَلِقَوْمِكَ ۖ وَسَوْفَ تُسْـَٔلُونَ

translations.text: Surely this ˹Quran˺ is a glory for you and your people. And you will ˹all˺ be questioned ˹about it˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-innahu lathikrun laka waliqawmikawasawfa tus-aloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَسْـَٔلْ مَنْ أَرْسَلْنَا مِن قَبْلِكَ مِن رُّسُلِنَآ أَجَعَلْنَا مِن دُونِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ءَالِهَةً يُعْبَدُونَ

translations.text: Ask ˹the followers of˺ the messengers that We already sent before you if We ˹ever˺ appointed ˹other˺ gods to be worshipped besides the Most Compassionate.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Was-al man arsalna minqablika min rusulina ajaAAalna min dooni arrahmanialihatan yuAAbadoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا مُوسَىٰ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَآ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ وَمَلَإِي۟هِۦ فَقَالَ إِنِّى رَسُولُ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ

translations.text: Indeed, We sent Moses with Our signs to Pharaoh and his chiefs, and he said: “I am a messenger of the Lord of all worlds.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaqad arsalna moosa bi-ayatinaila firAAawna wamala-ihi faqala innee rasoolu rabbialAAalameen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَلَمَّا جَآءَهُم بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَآ إِذَا هُم مِّنْهَا يَضْحَكُونَ

translations.text: But as soon as he came to them with Our signs, they laughed at them,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Falamma jaahum bi-ayatinaitha hum minha yadhakoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَا نُرِيهِم مِّنْ ءَايَةٍ إِلَّا هِىَ أَكْبَرُ مِنْ أُخْتِهَا ۖ وَأَخَذْنَـٰهُم بِٱلْعَذَابِ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَرْجِعُونَ

translations.text: although every sign We showed them was greater than the one before.<sup foot_note=77336>1</sup> Ultimately, We seized them with torments so that they might return ˹to the Right Path˺.<sup foot_note=77337>2</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama nureehim min ayatin illahiya akbaru min okhtiha waakhathnahum bilAAathabilaAAallahum yarjiAAoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَقَالُوا۟ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَ ٱلسَّاحِرُ ٱدْعُ لَنَا رَبَّكَ بِمَا عَهِدَ عِندَكَ إِنَّنَا لَمُهْتَدُونَ

translations.text: ˹Then˺ they pleaded, “O ˹mighty˺ magician! Pray to your Lord on our behalf, by virtue of the covenant He made with you.<sup foot_note=77338>1</sup> We will certainly accept guidance.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waqaloo ya ayyuha asahiruodAAu lana rabbaka bima AAahida AAindaka innanalamuhtadoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَلَمَّا كَشَفْنَا عَنْهُمُ ٱلْعَذَابَ إِذَا هُمْ يَنكُثُونَ

translations.text: But as soon as We removed the torments from them, they broke their promise.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Falamma kashafna AAanhumualAAathaba itha hum yankuthoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَنَادَىٰ فِرْعَوْنُ فِى قَوْمِهِۦ قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ أَلَيْسَ لِى مُلْكُ مِصْرَ وَهَـٰذِهِ ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِىٓ ۖ أَفَلَا تُبْصِرُونَ

translations.text: And Pharaoh called out to his people, boasting, “O my people! Am I not sovereign over Egypt as well as ˹all˺ these streams<sup foot_note=77339>1</sup> flowing at my feet? Can you not see?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wanada firAAawnu fee qawmihi qalaya qawmi alaysa lee mulku misra wahathihial-anharu tajree min tahtee afala tubsiroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَمْ أَنَا۠ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى هُوَ مَهِينٌ وَلَا يَكَادُ يُبِينُ

translations.text: Am I not better than this nobody who can hardly express himself?<sup foot_note=77340>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Am ana khayrun min hatha allatheehuwa maheenun wala yakadu yubeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَلَوْلَآ أُلْقِىَ عَلَيْهِ أَسْوِرَةٌ مِّن ذَهَبٍ أَوْ جَآءَ مَعَهُ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ مُقْتَرِنِينَ

translations.text: Why then have no golden bracelets ˹of kingship˺ been granted to him or angels come with him as escorts!”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Falawla olqiya AAalayhi aswiratun minthahabin aw jaa maAAahu almala-ikatumuqtarineen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَٱسْتَخَفَّ قَوْمَهُۥ فَأَطَاعُوهُ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ قَوْمًا فَـٰسِقِينَ

translations.text: And so he fooled his people, and they obeyed him. They were truly a rebellious people.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fastakhaffa qawmahu faataAAoohuinnahum kanoo qawman fasiqeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَلَمَّآ ءَاسَفُونَا ٱنتَقَمْنَا مِنْهُمْ فَأَغْرَقْنَـٰهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ

translations.text: So when they enraged Us, We inflicted punishment upon them, drowning them all.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Falamma asafoonaintaqamna minhum faaghraqnahum ajmaAAeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَجَعَلْنَـٰهُمْ سَلَفًا وَمَثَلًا لِّلْـَٔاخِرِينَ

translations.text: And We made them an example and a lesson for those after them.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: FajaAAalnahum salafan wamathalan lil-akhireen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ۞ وَلَمَّا ضُرِبَ ٱبْنُ مَرْيَمَ مَثَلًا إِذَا قَوْمُكَ مِنْهُ يَصِدُّونَ

translations.text: When the son of Mary was cited as an example ˹in argument˺, your people ˹O Prophet˺ broke into ˹joyful˺ applause.<sup foot_note=77341>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walamma duriba ibnu maryamamathalan itha qawmuka minhu yasiddoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَقَالُوٓا۟ ءَأَـٰلِهَتُنَا خَيْرٌ أَمْ هُوَ ۚ مَا ضَرَبُوهُ لَكَ إِلَّا جَدَلًۢا ۚ بَلْ هُمْ قَوْمٌ خَصِمُونَ

translations.text: They exclaimed, “Which is better: our gods or Jesus?” They cite him only to argue. In fact, they are a people prone to dispute.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waqaloo aalihatunakhayrun am huwa ma daraboohu laka illajadalan bal hum qawmun khasimoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا عَبْدٌ أَنْعَمْنَا عَلَيْهِ وَجَعَلْنَـٰهُ مَثَلًا لِّبَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ

translations.text: He was only a servant We showed favour to, and made as an example for the Children of Israel.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: In huwa illa AAabdun anAAamnaAAalayhi wajaAAalnahu mathalan libanee isra-eel
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَوْ نَشَآءُ لَجَعَلْنَا مِنكُم مَّلَـٰٓئِكَةً فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ يَخْلُفُونَ

translations.text: Had We willed, We could have easily replaced you ˹all˺ with angels,<sup foot_note=77342>1</sup> succeeding one another on earth.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaw nashao lajaAAalna minkummala-ikatan fee al-ardi yakhlufoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَعِلْمٌ لِّلسَّاعَةِ فَلَا تَمْتَرُنَّ بِهَا وَٱتَّبِعُونِ ۚ هَـٰذَا صِرَٰطٌ مُّسْتَقِيمٌ

translations.text: And his ˹second˺ coming is truly a sign for the Hour. So have no doubt about it, and follow me. This is the Straight Path.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-innahu laAAilmun lissaAAatifala tamtarunna biha wattabiAAooni hathasiratun mustaqeem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَا يَصُدَّنَّكُمُ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَكُمْ عَدُوٌّ مُّبِينٌ

translations.text: And do not let Satan hinder you, ˹for˺ he is certainly your sworn enemy.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wala yasuddannakumu ashshaytanuinnahu lakum AAaduwwun mubeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَمَّا جَآءَ عِيسَىٰ بِٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتِ قَالَ قَدْ جِئْتُكُم بِٱلْحِكْمَةِ وَلِأُبَيِّنَ لَكُم بَعْضَ ٱلَّذِى تَخْتَلِفُونَ فِيهِ ۖ فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ

translations.text: When Jesus came with clear proofs, he declared, “I have come to you with wisdom, and to clarify to you some of what you differ about. So fear Allah, and obey me.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walamma jaa AAeesa bilbayyinatiqala qad ji/tukum bilhikmati wali-obayyinalakum baAAda allathee takhtalifoona feehi fattaqooAllaha waateeAAoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ رَبِّى وَرَبُّكُمْ فَٱعْبُدُوهُ ۚ هَـٰذَا صِرَٰطٌ مُّسْتَقِيمٌ

translations.text: Surely Allah ˹alone˺ is my Lord and your Lord, so worship Him ˹alone˺. This is the Straight Path.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna Allaha huwa rabbee warabbukum faAAbudoohuhatha siratun mustaqeem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَٱخْتَلَفَ ٱلْأَحْزَابُ مِنۢ بَيْنِهِمْ ۖ فَوَيْلٌ لِّلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ مِنْ عَذَابِ يَوْمٍ أَلِيمٍ

translations.text: Yet their ˹various˺ groups have differed among themselves ˹about him˺, so woe to the wrongdoers when they face the torment of a painful Day!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fakhtalafa al-ahzabumin baynihim fawaylun lillatheena thalamoomin AAathabi yawmin aleem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: هَلْ يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّا ٱلسَّاعَةَ أَن تَأْتِيَهُم بَغْتَةً وَهُمْ لَا يَشْعُرُونَ

translations.text: Are they waiting for the Hour to take them by surprise when they least expect ˹it˺?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Hal yanthuroona illa assaAAataan ta/tiyahum baghtatan wahum la yashAAuroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ٱلْأَخِلَّآءُ يَوْمَئِذٍۭ بَعْضُهُمْ لِبَعْضٍ عَدُوٌّ إِلَّا ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ

translations.text: Close friends will be enemies to one another on that Day, except the righteous,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Al-akhillao yawma-ithin baAAduhumlibaAAdin AAaduwwun illa almuttaqeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يَـٰعِبَادِ لَا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْكُمُ ٱلْيَوْمَ وَلَآ أَنتُمْ تَحْزَنُونَ

translations.text: ˹who will be told,˺ “O My servants! There is no fear for you Today, nor will you grieve—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ya AAibadi la khawfunAAalaykumu alyawma wala antum tahzanoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا وَكَانُوا۟ مُسْلِمِينَ

translations.text: ˹those˺ who believed in Our signs and ˹fully˺ submitted ˹to Us˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Allatheena amanoo bi-ayatinawakanoo muslimeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ٱدْخُلُوا۟ ٱلْجَنَّةَ أَنتُمْ وَأَزْوَٰجُكُمْ تُحْبَرُونَ

translations.text: Enter Paradise, you and your spouses, rejoicing.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Odkhuloo aljannata antum waazwajukumtuhbaroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يُطَافُ عَلَيْهِم بِصِحَافٍ مِّن ذَهَبٍ وَأَكْوَابٍ ۖ وَفِيهَا مَا تَشْتَهِيهِ ٱلْأَنفُسُ وَتَلَذُّ ٱلْأَعْيُنُ ۖ وَأَنتُمْ فِيهَا خَـٰلِدُونَ

translations.text: Golden trays and cups will be passed around to them. There will be whatever the souls desire and the eyes delight in. And you will be there forever.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Yutafu AAalayhim bisihafinmin thahabin waakwabin wafeeha matashtaheehi al-anfusu watalaththu al-aAAyunu waantum feehakhalidoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَتِلْكَ ٱلْجَنَّةُ ٱلَّتِىٓ أُورِثْتُمُوهَا بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ

translations.text: That is the Paradise which you will be awarded for what you used to do.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Watilka aljannatu allatee oorithtumoohabima kuntum taAAmaloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَكُمْ فِيهَا فَـٰكِهَةٌ كَثِيرَةٌ مِّنْهَا تَأْكُلُونَ

translations.text: There you will have abundant fruit<sup foot_note=77343>1</sup> to eat from.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Lakum feeha fakihatunkatheeratun minha ta/kuloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ فِى عَذَابِ جَهَنَّمَ خَـٰلِدُونَ

translations.text: Indeed, the wicked will be in the torment of Hell forever.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna almujrimeena fee AAathabijahannama khalidoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَا يُفَتَّرُ عَنْهُمْ وَهُمْ فِيهِ مُبْلِسُونَ

translations.text: It will never be lightened for them, and there they will be overwhelmed with despair.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: La yufattaru AAanhum wahum feehimublisoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَا ظَلَمْنَـٰهُمْ وَلَـٰكِن كَانُوا۟ هُمُ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ

translations.text: We did not wrong them, but it was they who were the wrongdoers.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama thalamnahumwalakin kanoo humu aththalimeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَنَادَوْا۟ يَـٰمَـٰلِكُ لِيَقْضِ عَلَيْنَا رَبُّكَ ۖ قَالَ إِنَّكُم مَّـٰكِثُونَ

translations.text: They will cry, “O Mâlik!<sup foot_note=77344>1</sup> Let your Lord finish us off.” He will answer, “You are definitely here to stay.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wanadaw ya maliku liyaqdiAAalayna rabbuka qala innakum makithoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَقَدْ جِئْنَـٰكُم بِٱلْحَقِّ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَكُمْ لِلْحَقِّ كَـٰرِهُونَ

translations.text: We certainly brought the truth to you, but most of you were resentful of the truth.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Laqad ji/nakum bilhaqqiwalakinna aktharakum lilhaqqi karihoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَمْ أَبْرَمُوٓا۟ أَمْرًا فَإِنَّا مُبْرِمُونَ

translations.text: Or have they mastered some ˹evil˺ plan? Then We ˹too˺ are surely planning.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Am abramoo amran fa-inna mubrimoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَمْ يَحْسَبُونَ أَنَّا لَا نَسْمَعُ سِرَّهُمْ وَنَجْوَىٰهُم ۚ بَلَىٰ وَرُسُلُنَا لَدَيْهِمْ يَكْتُبُونَ

translations.text: Or do they think that We do not hear their ˹evil˺ thoughts and secret talks? Yes ˹We do˺! And Our messenger-angels are in their presence, recording ˹it all˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Am yahsaboona anna lanasmaAAu sirrahum wanajwahum bala warusulunaladayhim yaktuboon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قُلْ إِن كَانَ لِلرَّحْمَـٰنِ وَلَدٌ فَأَنَا۠ أَوَّلُ ٱلْعَـٰبِدِينَ

translations.text: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “If the Most Compassionate ˹really˺ had offspring, I would be the first worshipper.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qul in kana lirrahmaniwaladun faana awwalu alAAabideen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: سُبْحَـٰنَ رَبِّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ رَبِّ ٱلْعَرْشِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ

translations.text: Glorified is the Lord of the heavens and the earth, the Lord of the Throne, far above what they claim.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Subhana rabbi assamawatiwal-ardi rabbi alAAarshi AAamma yasifoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَذَرْهُمْ يَخُوضُوا۟ وَيَلْعَبُوا۟ حَتَّىٰ يُلَـٰقُوا۟ يَوْمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِى يُوعَدُونَ

translations.text: So let them indulge ˹in falsehood˺ and amuse ˹themselves˺ until they face their Day, which they have been warned of.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fatharhum yakhoodoowayalAAaboo hatta yulaqoo yawmahumu allatheeyooAAadoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ إِلَـٰهٌ وَفِى ٱلْأَرْضِ إِلَـٰهٌ ۚ وَهُوَ ٱلْحَكِيمُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ

translations.text: It is He Who is ˹the only˺ God in the heavens and ˹the only˺ God on the earth. For He is the All-Wise, All-Knowing.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wahuwa allathee fee assama-iilahun wafee al-ardi ilahun wahuwa alhakeemualAAaleem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَتَبَارَكَ ٱلَّذِى لَهُۥ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا وَعِندَهُۥ عِلْمُ ٱلسَّاعَةِ وَإِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ

translations.text: And Blessed is the One to Whom belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth and everything in between! With Him ˹alone˺ is the knowledge of the Hour. And to Him you will ˹all˺ be returned.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Watabaraka allathee lahu mulkuassamawati wal-ardi wamabaynahuma waAAindahu AAilmu assaAAatiwa-ilayhi turjaAAoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَا يَمْلِكُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِهِ ٱلشَّفَـٰعَةَ إِلَّا مَن شَهِدَ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَهُمْ يَعْلَمُونَ

translations.text: ˹But˺ those ˹objects of worship˺ they invoke besides Him have no power to intercede, except those who testify to the truth knowingly.<sup foot_note=77345>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wala yamliku allatheenayadAAoona min doonihi ashshafaAAata illaman shahida bilhaqqi wahum yaAAlamoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَئِن سَأَلْتَهُم مَّنْ خَلَقَهُمْ لَيَقُولُنَّ ٱللَّهُ ۖ فَأَنَّىٰ يُؤْفَكُونَ

translations.text: If you ask them ˹O Prophet˺ who created them, they will certainly say, “Allah!” How can they then be deluded ˹from the truth˺?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wala-in saaltahum man khalaqahumlayaqoolunna Allahu faanna yu/fakoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَقِيلِهِۦ يَـٰرَبِّ إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ قَوْمٌ لَّا يُؤْمِنُونَ

translations.text: ˹Allah is Aware of˺ the Prophet’s cry: “O my Lord! Indeed, these are a people who persist in disbelief.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waqeelihi ya rabbi inna haola-iqawmun la yu/minoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَٱصْفَحْ عَنْهُمْ وَقُلْ سَلَـٰمٌ ۚ فَسَوْفَ يَعْلَمُونَ

translations.text: So bear with them and respond with peace. They will soon come to know.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fasfah AAanhum waqulsalamun fasawfa yaAAlamoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration
